properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7 v8

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}One day when Heaven was filled with His praises One day when sin was as black as could be Jesus came forth to be born of a virgin Dwelt among men, my example is He Word became flesh and the light shined among us His glory revealed{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Living, He loved me Dying, He saved me Buried, He carried my sins far away Rising, He justified freely forever One day He’s coming Oh glorious day, oh glorious day{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}One day they led Him up Calvary’s mountain One day they nailed Him to die on a tree Suffering anguish, despised and rejected Bearing our sins, my Redeemer is He Hands that brought healing, stretched out on a tree And took the nails for me{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Living, He loved me Dying, He saved me Buried, He carried my sins far away Rising, He justified freely forever One day He’s coming Oh glorious day, oh glorious day{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}One day the grave could conceal Him no longer One day the stone rolled away from the door Then He arose, over death He had conquered Now He’s ascended, my Lord evermore Death could not hold Him, the grave could not keep Him From rising again{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Living, He loved me Dying, He saved me Buried, He carried my sins far away Rising, He justified freely forever One day He’s coming Oh glorious day, oh glorious day Oh glorious day{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}One day the trumpet will sound for His coming One day the skies with His glories will shine Wonderful day, my Beloved One, bringing My Savior, Jesus, is mine{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v8
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Living, He loved me Dying, He saved me Buried, He carried my sins far away Rising, He justified freely forever One day He’s coming Oh glorious day, oh glorious day Oh, Glorious day, Oh, Glorious day{/lang-eng}
